empty.title: Import your contacts
empty.description: Click the "Create a Contact" button to start using the app.
empty.after: Importing your contacts might take a few minutes, time to enjoy a well deserved coffee break ☕️

importation.creation: a contact has been created |||| %{smart_count} contacts have been created
importation.update: a contact has been updated |||| %{smart_count} contacts have been updated
importation.export_steps_intro: To get your contacts from another program, you must first export the whole list:
importation.export_to_vcard_step: Export your contacts in a file with vCard (*.vcf) format..
importation.partial_success: %{smart_count} of %{total} contact was imported. |||| %{smart_count} of %{total} contacts were imported.
importation.retry_hint: Please try again to complete your import.
importation.retry_or_select_another_hint: Try again or choose another file.
importation.title: Import contacts
importation.available_soon: You will soon be able to import your contacts from other services (iCloud, Facebook...).

groups.name: Name of the group
groups.remove_canceled: The group %{name} has been restored. Contacts are still linked.

delete-confirmation.title: Delete this contact? |||| Delete these contacts?
delete-confirmation.description: This contact will be removed permanently from your Cozy. |||| These contacts will be removed permanently from your Cozy.

intent.creation_error: An error occured while trying to contact the other app. Please try again later?

manifest.short_description: Cozy Contacts helps you to save and secure your contacts on your Cozy.
manifest.long_description:
With Cozy Contacts you can:
- Add, modify and sort your contacts.
- Imports all your contacts from Google, Facebook and more.

loading.fetching_contacts: Loading of your contacts, please wait.
